about_the_game:
*** PC version included for non-VR users!! Non-VR users can also play!! ***




Speedball Arena is a futuristic sports game developed for both VR and PC players!

Welcome to the Speedball Arena, where you can be the heroic athlete of the futuristic sports on a lightspeed hoverbike.

Get on the hoverbike to maneuver with the left hand and use the hook gun with your right hand to carry the ball to the opponent's goal to score.

Speedball Arena was inspired by the American ball game, Speedball which is a popular college sports. It brings the fun sports game to the imaginary world of VR with a twist of futuristic touch riding a hoverbike and grabbing a powerful hook gun to accelerate the gameplay with more excitement.

Real time multi-player sports game, Speedball Arena will be a unique and fun experience for all ages to play with real friends online. Based on the fair gameplay sports rule, Speedball Arena could evolve as one of most popular skill-based eSports game in the future!

*Please join our Discord server for a smooth multiplayer experience!

Features:
  • High-Quality Graphics: Speedball Arena, built on Unreal Engine 4, boasts the highest level of graphics to provide a fully immersive gaming experience.
  • Intuitive Control: Control your hoverbike and the hook gun with two VR motion controllers on each hand, and a keyboard and mouse for PC users. Intuitive control will let you become quickly absorbed in the virtual world.
  • Supersonic Speed: Hoverbike will allow you to enjoy the thrilling speed that no one has ever experienced before. Speed up even more by snatching the hook points floating in the air.
  • 2 vs 2 Match: Play with your friends online to pass the ball to your teammate or shoot for the goal. Don’t let the opponent snatch your ball!
  • Cross-Platform Play: Speedball Arena enables players to find a teammate and opponents via matchmaking. Every player, regardless of VR/non-VR user, connects to the same pool for matchmaking.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: intel(r) core(tm) i5-6200u cpu @ 2.30ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960(VR) / GeForce GTX 550(Non-VR)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6600 cpu @ 3.30ghz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070(VR) / GeForce GTX 750(Non-VR)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

reviews:
“I’ll admit that while I absolutely have not been a fan of many VR games, Speedball Arena does look like a lot of generic fun. It’s something that’s been missing from a ton of VR games: fun.”
One Angry Gamer

“This is Rocket League in VR, with bikes and a grappling gun. If you’re not excited yet, then let me tell you more. The game offers fast 2 on 2 game play with skill based shooting.”
minecraftunion

“Ever wanted to play Rocket League in VR? How about TRON? Snatchers is the closest we'll ever get to a competitive Virtual Reality game and to the other games.”
Scythe Plays
